Humidity: 79 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along the coast. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then light snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 21 January 2023
